SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_GET_CONSTITUENT_SOLICITCODES_LIST
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Gets a table list of active solicit codes for a given constituent.
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Memphis Sellers
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_GET_CONSTITUENT_SOLICITCODES_LIST( @CONSTITUENTID uniqueidentifier ) returns @SolicitCodeList TABLE ( -- Add the column definitions for the TABLE variable here codeDescription nvarchar(100) ) with execute as caller as begin -- do work here and return a value insert @SolicitCodeList select s.DESCRIPTION from dbo.CONSTITUENTSOLICITCODE cs join dbo.SOLICITCODE s on s.ID = cs.SOLICITCODEID where cs.CONSTITUENTID = @CONSTITUENTID and (cs.ENDDATE is null or (cs.ENDDATE is not null and Cast(cs.ENDDATE as date) < Cast(GETDATE() as date)))
return end
